reviewText: Too bad they don't release this one on DVD. . .Venom, a year past its peak, yet still the strongest live band in the world, and still carrying the black metal banner, as yet unwrested from them by upstarts like Metallica and Slayer.  A spectacular performance by a band that, to this day, has yet to receive it's due.  Join Venom's legions!  We're going wild!. . .
